text.more:
We select an initial list of obesity-related diseases and psychiatric disorders, and retrieve all potential relationships (edges) between genes and diseases (nodes) related to them in biomedical literature using Watson for Drug Discovery.
We selected only associations supported by two or more documents. Data were downloaded in october, 2018.
Node size represents degree.
Node color:
blue: psychiatric disorders exclusive genes
orange: psychiatric disorders
light green: shared genes
dark green: Obesity-related diseases
pink: obesity-related diseases exclusive genes

text.title: Obesity-related diseases and psychiatric disorders knowledge network.

legend.colorLabel: blue: psychiatric disorders exclusive genes, orange: psychiatric disorders, light green: shared genes, dark green: obesity-related diseases, pink: obesity-related diseases exclusive genes
